Class cryptix.pgp.PacketOutputStream 

java.lang.Object

           |
           +----java.io.FilterOutputStream

                   +----java.io.DataOutputStream
                           |
                           +----cryptix.pgp.PacketOutputStream
public class PacketOutputStream
extends DataOutputStream
Adds writePacket(), writeKeyRingEntry() and writeUserIdCertificate() functions to DataOutputStream.

Ian Brown
